text:
DataArts | Application Developer | Philadelphia, PA ONSITE | Full-time | http://culturaldata.org/about/careers/mid-level-application-...

We are a small dev team working to improve and extend a grant management system and survey system.

We use PHP/Laravel and AngularJS. There's some Python and R scripts floating around too. Everyone at DataArts has some kind connection to the arts in Philadelphia, though it is not required. We are a 501c nonprofit that was founded by Pew Research.
